params.costBasis: The cost basis for new securities (if positive delta)
params.quantityDelta: The change in quantity (can be negative)

returns.newLotId: The ID of the new adjusted lot

returns.lotId: The unique ID of the new lot

returns._0: True if the lot exists and is valid

params.user: The user whose lots to select from

returns.quantities: Array of quantities to take from each lot
returns.selectedLots: Array of lot IDs to use

params.strategy: The tax strategy to use for lot selection

adjustBalance(address,int256,uint256,str.notice: Adjust user's total balance (creates/removes securities as needed)

customIdToLotId(uint256).notice: Get lot ID from custom ID

getLotsOf(address).notice: Get all lot IDs owned by an account

isApprovedOrOwner(bytes32,address).notice: Check if an operator is approved for a lot

lotExists(bytes32).notice: Check if a lot exists and is valid

lotIdToCustomId(bytes32).notice: Get custom ID from lot ID

nextCustomId().notice: Get the next available custom ID

selectLotsForAmount(address,uint256).notice: Public function to select lots based on user's tax strategy (used by other facets)

setLotApproval(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Set approval for a specific lot

setOperatorApproval(address,bool).notice: Set operator approval for all lots

setTaxStrategy(uint8).notice: Set user's preferred tax lot selection strategy
